tool.name: Parse cd-hit-est clusters
tool.help:
**About**
This script is part of the mPuma pipeline. This perl script parses the cluster file generated with CD-HIT-EST for further downstream analysis.
**Usage**
Upload a cluster file from CD-HIT-EST or take the one from the CD-HIT-EST tool.
**Contact**
Please send any request or comment to mikel.egana.aranguren@gmail.com
